Name: Flower Breeze Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Let's fly with Flower Breeze. This Mount skill allows you to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Let's fly with Flower Breeze. This Mount skill allows you to travel very fast. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will fly automatically toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is available only on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Let's fly with Flower Breeze. This Mount skill allows you to travel very fast.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
